ingredients.ingredient: 2 (3.3 ounce) packages instant white chocolate pudding mix
3 (1.4 ounce) bars chocolate covered toffee bars, chopped

gear.name: Trifle bowl or large clear glass bowl

cookingTips: Dissolve instant coffee in warm water, then fold into the pudding mixture for mocha flavor
Cool brownies completely and cut into bite-sized cubes for easy layering and eating
Assemble trifle 2-3 hours before serving to allow flavors to meld; don't over-stir the layers to keep them distinct
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the assembly of a visually stunning trifle with distinct layers and balanced coffee-chocolate flavors.
